text: Smoking causes lung cancer.
Deforestation leads to soil erosion.
Regular exercise improves cardiovascular health.
Excess sugar intake increases risk of diabetes.
Heavy rainfall causes river flooding.
Vaccination reduces infectious disease spread.
Air pollution worsens asthma symptoms.
Lack of sleep lowers cognitive performance.
High salt consumption raises blood pressure.
Antibiotic overuse drives resistant bacteria.
Fertilizer runoff causes algal blooms.
Sun exposure without protection causes sunburn.
Lowering interest rates stimulates borrowing.
Seatbelt use reduces injury severity in crashes.
Heating metal causes thermal expansion.
Increased study time improves exam scores.
Chronic stress weakens immune function.
Drinking contaminated water causes cholera.
Introducing predators decreases prey population.
Raising minimum wage can increase labor costs.
Insulin lowers blood glucose levels.
Forest fires release smoke that reduces air quality.
A stronger wind pushes a sailboat faster.
Applying force to a spring compresses it.
Higher carbon dioxide concentrations warm the climate.
Ice cream sales and drowning rates both rise in summer.
Shoe size and reading level correlate in children.
Cities with more taxis also have more restaurants.
People who carry lighters are more likely to get lung disease.
Coffee sales and newspaper sales rise on weekday mornings.
Umbrella sales and traffic accidents both increase on rainy days.
Neighborhoods with more parks have higher home prices.
Children with larger vocabularies often have taller parents.
Higher internet use and higher electricity use often appear together.
Hospital size and number of surgeries performed are correlated.
Countries with more Nobel prizes also consume more chocolate.
More firefighters at a fire is associated with more damage.
People who own gyms tend to buy more protein powder.
Expensive schools and higher test scores are often observed together.
More sunscreen use and more beach injuries occur together in summer.
More umbrellas on streets and more wet sidewalks are observed together.
High shoe sales and high sports attendance coincide during tournament season.
Bigger kitchens and higher grocery spending often appear together.
Higher cloud cover and lower solar output occur together.
Longer daylight and higher tourism numbers coincide in summer.
Homes with pools and higher air-conditioning bills correlate.
More commuters and more coffee cups discarded are correlated.
Larger hospitals and higher ambulance traffic are correlated.
Higher tree counts and higher bird counts are correlated.
More app downloads and more smartphone sales move together.
The cat sat on the mat.
Stock prices rose on Tuesday.
Bananas are yellow when ripe.
The meeting was scheduled for Thursday.
She bought a blue notebook.
Mountains are visible from the valley.
The train arrived at noon.
He wore a red jacket.
The library opens at nine.
They cooked pasta for dinner.
A candle burned on the table.
The artist painted a landscape.
Birds nested near the river.
The keyboard has mechanical switches.
My phone battery is low.
The museum closed for renovation.
Clouds drifted across the sky.
The recipe uses olive oil.
Students waited outside the hall.
The package arrived yesterday.
The window was left open overnight.
A violin rested in its case.
The office printer needs paper.
Winter coats were on sale.
The baker prepared fresh bread.
